dbms.exececution
Class ExececutionMachine

java.lang.Object
  dbms.exececution.ExececutionMachine

public class ExececutionMachine
extends Object

This class implements a typical execution machine that executes the queries. The parser(and only the parser) calls the machine's methods, after it has succesfully parsed a command.

Author:
Skalistis Stefanos
See Also:
SQLParser

Field Detail

maxLength

private int[] maxLength
The maximum length of each column which is going to shown to the user. (Only usable in showResults.It is altered during the call of select).

Parameters:

columnName - The name of the column to be indexed.

select

public void select(ArrayList<SQLTokens> operationBetweenEachSelect,
                   ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> tablesOfEachSelect,
                   ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> columnsOfEachSelect,
                   ArrayList<ArrayList<Object[]>> conditionOfEachSelect,
                   ArrayList<String> orderingColumnOfEachSelect)
A general method for executing multiple SELECT's each one combined with the next by an operation specified by operationBetweenEachSelect list. For each SELECT, the tables taking part are specified by tablesBetweenEachSelect list.Also if conditions exists,they are specified by condiotionBetweenEachSelect list.Finally if an ordering column exists, it is specified by orderingColumnBetweenEachSelect list.

Parameters:
operationBetweenEachSelect - The operation between each select. In simple words UNION,INTERSECTION,MINUS.
tablesOfEachSelect - A list of tables for each SELECT(those in the FROM section).
columnsOfEachSelect - A list of columns for each SELECT(those in the SELECT section).
conditionOfEachSelect - A list of conditions for each SELECT(those in the WHERE section).If none exist then the list is empty.
orderingColumnOfEachSelect - A list of the names of (ordering)columns for each SELECT(those in the ORDER BY section).If there is no ORDER BY the name is the empty String.

simpleSelect

private LinkedList<Object>[] simpleSelect(Object[] tableNames,
                                          Object[] columnNames,
                                          Object[] condition,
                                          String orderingColumn)
Executes a simple SELECT command while making all the neccessary checks. If all the checks have passed then it updates the maxLength.

Parameters:
tableNames - An array of the tables that are joined(those in the FROM section).
columnNames - An array of columns (those in the SELECT section).
condition - An array of conditions (those in the WHERE section).If none exist then it is null.
orderingColumn - The ordering column.If there is none then it is the empty String.
Returns:
The results that where found after the execution.If an error occurs returns null.

showResults

public void showResults(LinkedList[] results,
                        int[] maxLenghts,
                        ArrayList<String> columnNames,
                        ArrayList<String> tableNames)
Shows the results to the output.

Parameters:
results - The results to be shown.
maxLenghts - The maximum length(in characters) of each column.

updateSecondaryIndexes

public void updateSecondaryIndexes(LinkedList<Record> recordsMoved,
                                   LinkedList<Reference> oldReferenceList,
                                   LinkedList<Reference> newReferenceList)
Updates the secondary indexes whenever there is a change in the data due to a call of deleteFrom(...) or insertedInto(...)/code>

Parameters:
recordsMoved - The records that changed position in the disk.
oldReferenceList - The old position.
newReferenceList - Their current position.
